metadata.name: Execute From Alternate Data Streams
metadata.comment: Detects execution from an Alternate Data Stream (ADS). Adversaries may use NTFS file attributes to hide their malicious data in order to evade detection

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('txt:')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' > ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('makecab ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cab')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' export ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regedit ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('esentutl ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /y ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /d ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /o '))))

output.summary: Detects execution from an Alternate Data Stream (ADS). Adversaries may use NTFS file attributes to hide their malicious data in order to evade detection
